entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or periods of freezing drizzle beginning this morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
